original_text: But suppose the servant says to himself, ‘My master is taking a long time in coming,’ and he then begins to beat the other servants, both men and women, and to eat and drink and get drunk.
korean_text: 만일 그 종이 마음에 생각하기를 주인이 더디 오리라 하여 남녀 종들을 때리며 먹고 마시고 취하게 되면

sentences.original_text: But suppose the servant says to himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 종이 마음속으로 스스로 말한다고 가정해보자

sentences.original_text: 'My master is taking a long time in coming,'
sentences.korean_translation: '내 주인이 오는데 시간이 오래 걸리고 있다'

sentences.original_text: and he then begins to beat the other servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 다른 종들을 때리기 시작한다

sentences.original_text: and to eat and drink and get drunk
